Source code¶

Source code is split into 3 files.

Logger¶

Logger class definition used in whole class.

class pps.logger.Logger¶

Bases: object

Logic¶

This file defines all operations with printer jobs.

pps.logic.handle_print_job(ip, printer, date, username, full_file_path, print_job, paper_format)¶

Handle print job

Server¶

This file contains Flask server definition. It handles all actions from user.

pps.server.add_new_info()¶
pps.server.create_app(*args, **kwargs)¶

Create flask app with all configuration set
